name: Jelly Pop King! Popping and Matching Line Game!
name_original: Jelly Pop King! Popping and Matching Line Game!
description:
Looking for a game to test your Super-Puzzling skills?

Then Download and try this Super Awesome Puzzle Game!

PLAY ALL DAY!!

Match huge lines of super-cute and chubby Jelly's!

Match jellies together by linking all same colored and adjacent jellies!

Match four or five or more jellies for awesome power-ups!

You’ll come across a variety of new game modes on your travels - it’s time to show off your puzzle-solving skills!

Features:

>Hundreds of levels of adorable jelly-matching action!

>Super-boosts to help you with those tight levels

Now… let’s pop some jellies!
